title: 100% Princess
description: New Post from @StayAtHomeBrat: Yesterday was my birthday. Started with my Daddy (who loves the house nice and tidy) telling me if I wanted my presents I needed to be a good girl. LMAO. Guess how that went? I stuck out my tongue, then made a mess in the bedroom with all my clothes while looking for something to wear to dinner. Next thing I knew he had me tied up to the bed. Best gift ever.The set-up: A group of BRATS love to chat in an online forum about their sex lives.The stories: Each stand-alone story is a look inside the relationship of a BRAT and her TAMER.The steam: Scorching hot monogamous pairings with love, trust, and kink.
author: Frankie Love
